Kup:

Kup looked at Tucson adn said "But Rodimus and Nightlight look normal as if 
nothing had happened, it's somthing i Windlord's heart that is boiling up"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Tuesday, June 28, 2011 11:06 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Changing times (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)

Tucson turns to Kup. He too, could sense something a miss.

" You're right Kup, something is disturbing about Windlord...  It seems that 
perhaps some Predacon programming may have remained there residually.. 
Hopefully Stanton and Bump will be able to convince him to have another scan 
done of his logic circuitry, just to be on the safe side.  No doubt that 
Hydras has impacted us all, especially those who have been infected by that 
Predacon shell program."

He tightens his fist.

" That is why perhaps it's wise that I confront him one on one.  He has not 
infected me but has struck at Rodimus, Windlord and Nightlight.  For their 
saftey, I take the burden of dealing with Hydras personally."

Straight Shot, Uproar, Quickstride, and Rat Trap nearly fall out of their 
seats with eyes wide with shock. Straight Shot is the first to speak up.

"ARE YOU NUTS?!  YOU CAN'T DO THAT HE'LL KILL YOU!"

Quickstride chimes in next.

"Yeah, that's like whoah, seriously not a very good decision sir..  Very 
generous but wow, that could really be messy."

Rat Trap looks to Tucson.

"Wheels, ya can't, ya just can't do that.  You got a great bunch of bots, 
like ya said, please ya gotta accept help this time."

Tucson looks to everyone.

" I know you have all expressed concern over my actions, when it comes to 
Hydras, and I fully understand why you are so concerned.  Hydras needs to be 
stopped, but I can not expect any of you to become vulnerable to his attack, 
when it is I who should be doing something about him personally.  Rodimus, I 
owe it to you to avenge what he has done to you, Nightlight and Windlord, 
soley due to the fact that when you needed me years ago, I did not come 
through for you.  Now, I have to redeem myself for that costly mistake, and 
amend the wrongs which have been set upon you."

Uproar looks to Tucson.

" But, that wasn't your fault.  I read up on it, you didn't do anything 
wrong, you were out there going above and beyond the call of duty and you 
were unexpectedly hit from behind.  There was no way you could have avoided 
what happened to you.  Although, we don't know who did it do we?  That 
wasn't in the intel I read.  Guys, We can't let Tucson face Hydras all 
alone, it's way too dangerous."

Straight Shot looks to Leo Prime and everyone else.

"Leo Prime,everyone, I believe I know how ta fill in the gaps as to what 
happened vorns ago.  I was with him during that battle.  He had finished 
dealing with some of the heavy hitting battlechargers, when he noticed that 
Rodimus and the others were getting seriously pegged out in battle.  He 
couldn't just sit there and watch it happen, and he knew that decoy detail 
wasn't best suited for his alt form which at the time, was more designed for 
utility and off road driving.  But he couldn't bare to see anyone suffer or 
be oppressed so he did the unthinkable, and beyond his ability 
specifications, he sped out there to catch the attentions of the Seekers, 
who were concentrating on striking at the Autobot speedsters.  Well, Tucson 
got their attention and began to draw them away from Rodimus and the others, 
but then, un be known to him, way out in the distance, Cyclonus hid himself 
nicely among cloud cover, and decided to take a pop shot at Tucson.  Well, I 
saw out of the rear view, Cyclonus in the distance, and then I saw the shot 
coming toward us.  After that, Tucson and I were struck, but I was the only 
one who saw the shot and the perpetrator.  Then, anything after the strike, 
I really don't remember."

Night Shift now hobbles into the room slowly.

" I do.  I - was there too.  I could see Cyclonus headn' toward 'em, but I 
was so far off fightn' some of the combaticons, I couldn't get there fast 
enough ta swing Tucson or Straight Shot outa the way.  I was miles behind 
them  and no matter how loud I beeped my horn ta warn 'em, they couldn't 
hear me.  Then, yeah, I saw that slag ball hit my buddy, and there was an 
explosion that went miles up in the sky.. I thought for sure he was a 
gonner..  I did my best ta get back up, and then got Tucson back ta base.. 
He was off line for a long time, and when he woke up, he thought the power 
went out..  Little did he know he was struck blind by Cyclonus, never ta see 
the light of day again, or at least until he got a second opinion from a 
medic."

Straight Shot knew that Talon would also like to see Tucson get his sight 
back.  She smiles to Talon and puts a hand on hers.

" I think Talon said it best, when she said it was time we gave Tucson back 
his eyes.  Leo Prime, before anything else, I think it's time you guys 
fought as a whole, and you really can't do that unless all of you can see 
the road ahead of you.  So, if I may do so, I want to request that Tucson 
Prime undergoes a detailed examination and full repair of his visual 
impairment."

Tucson looks to Straight Shot and Talon.

"They're right.  It's time I stopped procrastinating.  Stanton, Bump, I 
would like to give you two the honor of undergoing this proceedure.  I've 
seen your work, and I would be honored if you would perform the repairs."

He looks to everyone confidently.

" We will do this, we will overcome every obsticle they've put in front of 
us.  But we must work as a team if we're to achieve success."

>

> those who say them will have to answer to me!  Is that understood?!"
